Text: im new at this but i want to download this game what do you have to do once you download the torrent??

are you talking about this torrent? because it's not the game, it's just a crack for it.

depends what kind of file the game you downloaded is (.iso, .rar, etc) so I can't really help u with that here..

if you mean how do you crack your already installed game (version 1.24.3) then you just unrar and then copy and paste the contents into the bin folder where you installed the sims 3.

For some reason it doesn't work for me.

I did a clean install,updated the game,copied this crack,even blocked my game in the firewall and after starting it still asks for the authentication code.

If i disconnect from the internet it asks for a connection to the internet.

:(

it wont work, when i try and open the screen goes black then back to normal with an error message saying 'unable to start game. service initialization failed {random numbers}' can anybody help me get it to work?
